thread.title: Oxfam faces fresh sex abuse allegations

title: Oxfam faces fresh sex abuse allegations
text:
Oxfam faces fresh sex abuse allegations 8:54pm IST - 01:55 
British aid organisation Oxfam faced fresh pressure on Tuesday after a former senior member of staff said her concerns about ''a culture of sexual abuse'' involving aid workers in some the organisation's offices had been ignored.   
British aid organisation Oxfam faced fresh pressure on Tuesday after a former senior member of staff said her concerns about "a culture of sexual abuse" involving aid workers in some the organisation's offices had been ignored.  //reut.rs/2sySVhF
